description: [``botocore``] Add support for the prompt caching feature for Bedrock Prompt Management
[``botocore``] Raised the documentParameters size limit to 30 KB for AWS IoT Device Management - Jobs.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for dynamic audio configuration and the ability to disable the deblocking filter for h265 encodes.
[``botocore``] Minor fix to ARN validation for Lambda functions passed to S3 Batch Operations
[``botocore``] No longer sign transfer-encoding header for SigV4
